content.title: Syphilitic Aortitis
content.description: Tertiary syphilis manifestation causing obliterative endarteritis of the vasa vasorum leading to aortic complications.

clinical_features.pathology: Obliterative endarteritis of vasa vasorum causing medial necrosis

treatment.medical: Penicillin G treatment for active infection
treatment.surgical: Indicated for aneurysm or significant aortic regurgitation

content.clinical_pearl: Now rare but should be considered in ascending aortic aneurysm with atypical features, especially in endemic areas
